## Description
Brief description of the changes in this PR.

## Type of Change
- [ ] Bug fix (non-breaking change which fixes an issue)
- [ ] New feature (non-breaking change which adds functionality)
- [ ] Breaking change (fix or feature that would cause existing functionality to not work as expected)
- [ ] Documentation update
- [ ] Performance improvement
- [ ] Accessibility improvement

## Testing
- [ ] Unit tests pass (`npm run test:unit`)
- [ ] E2E tests pass (`npm run test:e2e`)
- [ ] Accessibility tests pass (`npm run test:a11y`)
- [ ] Visual regression tests pass (`npm run test:visual`)
- [ ] Manual testing completed

## Accessibility Checklist
- [ ] All interactive elements are keyboard accessible
- [ ] Color contrast meets WCAG 2.2 AA standards (4.5:1)
- [ ] Screen reader announcements are appropriate
- [ ] Focus indicators are visible and clear
- [ ] Form inputs have proper labels and error messages
- [ ] No accessibility violations in automated tests

## Security Checklist
- [ ] No sensitive data exposed in client-side code
- [ ] API endpoints properly validate user permissions
- [ ] Input validation and sanitization implemented
- [ ] No hardcoded secrets or credentials

## Performance Checklist
- [ ] No unnecessary re-renders or memory leaks
- [ ] Images optimized and properly sized
- [ ] Bundle size impact assessed
- [ ] Core Web Vitals maintained

## Screenshots
If applicable, add screenshots to help explain your changes.

## Additional Notes
Any additional information that reviewers should know.
